languages.text: "Иными словами, у капитана фобия. Подобные иррациональные страхи часто встречаются у ветеранов, столкнувшимися с врагами Человечества. Весьма неудачное стечение обстоятельств, так мы далеко не продвинемся".

"In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."
languages.original_text: "Иными словами, у капитана фобия. Подобные иррациональные страхи часто встречаются у ветеранов, столкнувшимися с врагами Человечества. Весьма неудачное стечение обстоятельств, так мы далеко не продвинемся".

traits.locale_text: "In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

"In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

"In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

"In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

"In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

languages.text: «O lo que es lo mismo, el capitán tiene una fobia. Suelen verse este tipo de miedos irracionales entre los veteranos que se han enfrentado a los enemigos de la Humanidad. Este infortunio no va a sernos de ayuda».
languages.original_text: "In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

traits.locale_text: «O lo que es lo mismo, el capitán tiene una fobia. Suelen verse este tipo de miedos irracionales entre los veteranos que se han enfrentado a los enemigos de la Humanidad. Este infortunio no va a sernos de ayuda».

languages.text: 「つまり、中隊長は恐怖症を持っているのです。このような不合理な恐怖は、人類の敵に立ち向かったことのある古参によく見られるものです。これは最も不幸な状況であり、ここでは何の役にも立たないということです」
languages.original_text: "In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、中隊長は恐怖症を持っているのです。このような不合理な恐怖は、人類の敵に立ち向かったことのある古参によく見られるものです。これは最も不幸な状況であり、ここでは何の役にも立たないということです」

languages.text: “换句话说，这位上尉患有恐惧症。这种非理性的恐惧，在与人类之敌交手过的老兵之中非常常见。发生这样的情况着实遗憾，这对我们的调查毫无帮助。”
languages.original_text: "In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

traits.locale_text: “换句话说，这位上尉患有恐惧症。这种非理性的恐惧，在与人类之敌交手过的老兵之中非常常见。发生这样的情况着实遗憾，这对我们的调查毫无帮助。”

languages.text: "Mit anderen Worten: Der Captain hat eine Phobie. Derart irrationale Ängste sind unter Veteranen, die gegen die Feinde der Menschheit gekämpft haben, keine Seltenheit. Das sind ausgesprochen unerfreuliche Umstände, die uns hier nicht helfen werden."
languages.original_text: "In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

traits.locale_text: "Mit anderen Worten: Der Captain hat eine Phobie. Derart irrationale Ängste sind unter Veteranen, die gegen die Feinde der Menschheit gekämpft haben, keine Seltenheit. Das sind ausgesprochen unerfreuliche Umstände, die uns hier nicht helfen werden."

languages.text: « En d'autres mots, le capitaine a une phobie. L'apparition de peurs irrationnelles n'est pas rare chez les vétérans qui ont affronté les ennemis de l'humanité. Dans le cas présent, cela ne fait que s'ajouter à un ensemble de circonstances pour le moins malheureuses qui ne nous seront d'aucune aide, bien au contraire. »
languages.original_text: "In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."

traits.locale_text: « En d'autres mots, le capitaine a une phobie. L'apparition de peurs irrationnelles n'est pas rare chez les vétérans qui ont affronté les ennemis de l'humanité. Dans le cas présent, cela ne fait que s'ajouter à un ensemble de circonstances pour le moins malheureuses qui ne nous seront d'aucune aide, bien au contraire. »

languages.text: "Başka bir deyişle kaptanın fobisi var. Böylesine yersiz korkular, İnsanlığın düşmanları ile yüzleşen kıdemliler arasında yaygındır. Akla gelebilecek en talihsiz koşullarla karşı karşıyayız. Bu durumun bize hiçbir faydası dokunmayacak."
languages.original_text: "In other words, the captain has a phobia. Such irrational fears are common among veterans who have faced the enemies of Humanity. This is a most unfortunate set of circumstances that won't help us here."
